data.title: Ali Landry’s brother-in-law, father-in-law found dead
data.meta_description: Ali Landry's brother-in-law, father-in-law found dead
data.text:
Ali Landry’s father-in-law and brother-in-law were found dead in Mexico, according to USA Today.

A statement from the state’s attorney general said Juan Manuel Gomez Fernandez and Juan Manuel Gomez Monteverde were discovered Sept. 19 by relatives, near the remote town of Pueblo Viejo. They were the father and brother of Landry’s husband, film director Alejandro Monteverde.

The statement said both men suffered brain trauma and had been dead for several days. They were reported kidnapped Sept 4.

Landry is an actress and former Miss USA who became famous for being the “Doritos girl” in commercials during the late ’90s. In 1999 she was named one of People magazine’s “50 Most Beautiful.”

Tony Hicks writes celebrity commentary for the Bay Area News Group. Contact him at Facebook.com/BayAreaNewsGroup.TonyHicks or Twitter.com/tonyhicks67
